subject: Extension of time period of panel of Independent Experts of Conciliation Committees of Independent Experts (CCIEs- 3)
text: MRd <54 WTTHNif9ferarrot (7s4 #Rdev &r rTANf 4AT, 4Ra TRAR) National Highways Authority of India M &&9 (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) H7na Tn 5i-5 Qa 6, #7z7-10, ERAT, #f fcrlt 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, Delhi-110075 /Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ Dispute Resolution/2024 Policy Circular No_ 2.1.78/ 2024 dated 20th August , 2024 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/CMD/CCIEExtn./2020-21 (Comp. No. 5472)} Sub: Extension of time period of  panel of Independent Experts of Conciliation Committees of Independent Experts (CCIEs- 3) reg: NHAI vide Policy Circular No. 2.1.23/2017 dated 02.06.2017 established a conciliation and settlement mechanism for the early resolution and settlement of claims arising out of the Contractual Disputes under the Contract Agreements with the Contractors/ Concessionaires/ Consultants in NHAI. The CCIE- 3 was constituted and published vide Policy Circular No. 2.1.31/2019 dated 16.09.2019 The broad Terms & Conditions and Terms of Reference of the Committeel Experts (CCIE- 3) are as per Annexure -1 of Policy dated 02.06.2017 and amendment dated 19.06.2017 , 18.07.2018 and 03.08.2018. As per Annexure-1 of the Policy Circular dated 02.06.2017, the of Independent Experts approved under guideline dated 16.09.2019 was valid upto 15.09.2022. 2 At present, the composition of Conciliation Committee of Independent Experts 3 is as under: (i) Shri Vijay Chhibber _ IAS (Retd.) (ii) Shri B.N. Singh, Ex DG (RD) & SS, MORT&H (iii) Shri N.R. Dash, Ex Addl. Controller General, Ministry of Defence 3_ The tenure /terms of the Committee was extended from 16.09.2022 to 15.09.2023 vide NHAI Policy Circular No: 2.1.55/2022 dated 29.07.2022 and further   from 16.09.2023 to 15.09.2024 vide NHAI Policy Circular No. 2.1.61/2023 dated 17.08.2023. 4 the Competent   Authority has extended the tenurelterms of the aforesaid Committee for a further period of one year i.e. from 16.09.2024 to 15.09.2025. 5 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. 2010|24 (CS.
